name: Sloppy Joes
preparation: In Sauté Pan, brown beef over medium-high heat, 5–7 min. Use Ground Meat Separator to break up chunks.
Stir in seasoning, water, and tomato paste. Reduce heat to medium; simmer, stirring occasionally, for 5 min. Spoon over buns, if desired.
tips: Replace meat with 1 can (19 oz/540 ml) lentils, drained and rinsed. Combine as above and simmer for 5 min. Slash carbs and serve in lettuce cups instead of buns.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup mixed veggies and 1 small bun.

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.
